div.p: This code system https://fhir.ehealth-systems.at/kiola/careplan/category defines the following code:

tr.td: Main care plan, that is used to describe the overall plan of a patient. All other care plans to be considered for a patients care, must be part of this care plan.

title.value: KIOLA Care Plan Category Code System

description.value: Categories of care plans supported by KIOLA.

definition.value: Main care plan, that is used to describe the overall plan of a patient. All other care plans to be considered for a patients care, must be part of this care plan.
